channel.title: Blog Posts on doesn0texist
channel.description: Recent content in Blog Posts on doesn0texist

item.title: High School Chromebook Shenanigans
item.description: High school sucked, and I’m gonna talk about a time where I was able to use a Chromebook to slack off in ways that most students could only dream of. Like I said above, high school sucked ass in many, many, many, many, many ways. This was an alarming amount of ass suckage - I was bored out of my mind most days attempting to stay awake while I was in a place for a third of a full day sitting in on things that I had little to no interest in learning.

item.title: Welcome to my Blog!
item.description: For years, I’ve wanted to make my own blog and website but was never able to get the motivation to sit down and do it. Now, it’s a reality. I just want to thank you for dropping by my blog and taking the time to at least skim by my posts - I appreciate the fact that someone else would read this stuff more than you can imagine. I am going to make posts about technology, video games, life, and anything else I can come by, and I hope you’re around to enjoy the ride.
